thread.title: LGBT rainbow stars at Christopher Bailey's last Burberry collection

title: LGBT rainbow stars at Christopher Bailey's last Burberry collection
text:
LGBT rainbow stars at Christopher Bailey's last Burberry collection Tuesday, February 20, 2018 - 01:44 
Christopher Bailey's last collection for Burberry featured supermodels Adwoa Aboah and Cara Delevingne, as well as rainbow checks in celebration of the LGBT community. Rough cut. No reporter narration.
